key_context.summary: New Ventures tribe is organizing multiple product demos to present work to the company. Cross selling MVP confirmed for next week, Good Chop Multi-SKU demo for Nov 18, with VMS and TPT planning future sessions.
key_context.relevance: Critical for showcasing tribe value and coordinating cross-team visibility

key_context.summary: TAM is at only 33% IT Cap reporting with deadline of 08.10. NV improved to 79% with 97% of folks reported, but discrepancies remain with departed employees.
key_context.relevance: Essential for portfolio reporting and resource allocation tracking

key_context.summary: Recent re-org caused cancellation and rescheduling of operations review meeting. Teams are reassessing priorities and demo opportunities in light of organizational changes.
key_context.relevance: Affects team coordination, meeting cadences, and project prioritization

key_context.summary: One-time purchase (OTP) system being rolled out across multiple teams including Good Chop (W51), VMS (W51), and Occasion boxes (ANZ first). Multiple launches coordinated for late December.
key_context.relevance: Major cross-team initiative requiring coordination and demo planning

key_context.summary: Teams discussing what makes good demo content - needs to be recent, customer-problem focused, novel enough for audience, and ideally launched or in beta/alpha testing.
key_context.relevance: Guides project selection for company visibility and ensures quality presentations

key_context.summary: Multiple team members on PTO including Nikita (paternity leave), U03TY4YJU4X (out next week), U01KKT2P7FY (month-long PTO starting 2nd week Dec), and U03R6F2AG9K (PTO mon/tues next week).
key_context.relevance: Impacts demo participation, project ownership, and coordination needs

summary: New Ventures tribe coordinating multiple company-wide product demos with Cross selling MVP and Good Chop Multi-SKU confirmed, while addressing IT Cap tracking urgency (TAM at 33%) and navigating re-org impacts on operations and team coordination.
